name: Chicago Drill
description: Bass-heavy, dense, and typically syncopated percussion, featuring ticking hi-hats and gunshot-like snare rolls, usually accompanied by menacing synth melodies and violent Gangsta Rap lyricism.

children.name: Bop
children.description: Grew out of the Chicago Drill scene in the early 2010s, characterized by autotuned vocals and upbeat synth melodies.
